hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Abi Awfa said:"When people brought their Zakah to him, the Messenger of Allah would say: 'O Allah, send salah upon the family of so-and-so,' My father brought his Sadaqah to him and he said: 'O Allah, send Salah upon the family of Abu Awfa

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الإِمَامِ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الصَّدَقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Ruler Supplicating For Blessings Upon The Giver Of Sadaqah
